name: Run Whoami Showing Privileges
description: Detects a whoami.exe executed with the /priv command line flag instructing the tool to show all current user privieleges. This is often used after a privilege escalation attempt.
false_positives: Administrative activity (rare lookups on current privileges)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\whoami.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:whoami.exe) AND process.command_line:*\/priv*)`
